channel.title: HELP, very fast
channel.description: Theres someone spamming my connection+ connecting to my server, all the same ip, just different ports....... is there a way to prohibit connection limit or what? his ips ban yet its still letting him connect useing different ports

item.title: HELP, very fast

ok then he is useing his cmd mask his ip or to append to banip i would monitor your server cmd and if you notice any thing odd pm me so i can anyliz it and see if i can make some thing to help you.
